query: WITH entities AS (SELECT public_id, id FROM core_disbursals WHERE (COALESCE((public_id, id) < ($3, $2), $2 IS NULL)) ORDER BY public_id DESC, id DESC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $4 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_disbursal_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.public_id desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
